I don't know what it is with the cat but the past 2 days I've been making sandwiches for lunch. As soon as I crack the deli meat baggie the cat starts trying to climb the cabinets and mews like crazy. I then look at her and explain to her that she can't have deli meat because it will give her kidney failure. She doesn't seem to get it tho. She just keeps on mewing and hoping that I'll feed her some of the forbidden stuff locked away in a bag that smells so good. She breaks my heart and she knows it because once I put it away she gives me this hurt "How could you not give me any? Don't you love me?" looks. Oh well she'll get over it.

Oy! What a weekend. I went thru and cleaned the entire apartment because I'm anal retentive. It's spotless now, I just hope it stays that way. Decided to recommit myself to getting healthy and in-shape. I'm eating well today and starting the Couch 2 5K program today. But I think I'm going to feel pretty stupid walking for a minute and a half and jogging for a minute for 20 minutes. But oh well, if it means in 12 weeks I'll be able to run 3 miles I'll be happy. I decided I'm going to do yoga on the off days. So 3 days of runnin to get me in shape and 3 days of yoga to limber me up and lean me down. Plus yoga kind of centers me. It gives me a peace that I don't really get anywhere else yet. It really makes me aware of my body. I think I'm going to start another Blog to keep as a food/Exercise journal to keep track of what I'm doing. Think I'll go do that now!

So as it goes I feel wonderful today. I'm attributing it to my reaffirmation in healthy eating and exercise. Of course it is, why wouldn't it be? I feel less bloated and more energized. Of course I overslept this morning but I think it's because I didn't go to bed until late even tho I was tired. So today's Yoga. I love yoga, I can't even explain it. It's so relaxing and after the day I had I'm going to really need it!!

Phew! Boy am I beat. But I feel good tho. I feel accomplished. It's actually a really good program. By the time you think you're lungs are going to concave from the running you go back to walking to recoup. But holy shit am I beat now. I think I'm gonna go chill out and watch a movie. I'm on my way - day one in the books. Yoga tomorrow!!!

I'm feeling pretty good about today. I'm tired but I'm amped about starting my workout routine. Eating well is usually not too bad until I think that I've blown it and give up and scarf everything I can get my hands on. It makes it difficult to follow a "program". I think I might try to do this on my own and see how it goes. They say a self-developed program is the best way to do things. Eating things that are healthy for me, cutting calories where I can, working out according to my plan. I think I'm going to try that for the month of July and see how it works. If it goes well, I'll keep it up and cancel weight watchers. If not I'll get onto the weight watchers thing. Anyway. Day 1 at 190lbs. I have to check my body fat on that scale when I get home. I'm sure it's disgustingly high. Hopefully that'll change soon!
